name: CPx86
short_description: CPx86 (currently in Alpha development stages) will be a fully fledged IRC bot, multi-user BNC server, and an Automated Network protection bot. Currently, the SDK covers all needed aspects of IRCd, and is extremely stable and functional. For Linux/Windows
